Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Kedzie-Homan
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/24th Place
ShortDescription: EB 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Cermak, Kostner, Ogden and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero/24th Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Cermak, Kostner, Ogden and Cicero, due to street blockage near Cicero/24th Place.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
